In this release:
- timeout for scaffolder API requests has been added;
- disabled installations check logic has been refactored.
See [./docs/releases/v0.73.2-changelog.md](https://github.com/giantswarm/backstage/blob/main/docs/releases/v0.73.2-changelog.md) for more information.
